data.actual_result: Two things appears next to the music's icon and the progress bar becomes static.
data.short_description: When we check our profile and share, with Spotify RPC, a music wich is in a private playlist and open then close a game, two things appear next to the music pic' and the progress bar stop move.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go on your PC and display Spotify as a status. - Hear a music that it is in a private playlist.  - Go on your profile. - Start and close a game. - Wait that Spotify RPC is back.
